name: Cheers to a New Year
description:
3....2....1... Happy New Year! This 2-color screen printed card features hand-drawn illustrations and text. Printed in metallic black and light blue on kraft paper.

- A2 size (4 1/4" x 5 1/2" when folded)
- Blank interior
- Paired with a French's Dur-O-Tone Butcher Blue Envelope
- Printed on 100 lb. French's Speckletone Kraft 
- Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia

Available as a single card or as a set of 6

name: No Deposit Bag
description:
I was always told, "You have to put in to get out." With this reenforced jute (burlap) bag, you can save the Earth one grocery bag at a time. Measuring 13" x 15" and having a 4.5" expandable base, this bag is ready to sling over your shoulder and earn it's keep.

- Hand wash as needed.
- Single color, limited run design.
- Ready to carry up to 25lb. even if you're not.

name: Conan Screen Print
description:
Conan O'Brien's final words of advice during his last night on NBC are words to live by. This one color screen print features hand-drawn text. Printed in slate on orange paper.

- 11" x 17"
- Printed on 80 lb. French's Dur-O-Tone Butcher Orange
- Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia
- Ships in a flat kraft mailer

Check out the custom poster that inspired this print. http://mapleandbelmont.com/blog/?p=872

name: United We Stand Print
description:
Celebrate America with this one color screen print featuring gold ink on your choice of dark blue or red paper.

- 8" x 10"
- Printed on 100 lb. French's Construction Nightshift Blue or French's Speckletone Wine
- Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia
- Ships in a large flat kraft mailer

name: Any 6 Cards
description:
Pick any 6 of our cards for $18! Mix and match to your heart's content. When you are checking out in paypal, you can note your choices by clicking "add" next to "note to seller" under your shipping address. Or if that's too complicated, email your choices to hello(at)mapleandbelmont.com.

- A2 size (4 1/4" x 5 1/2" when folded)
- Blank interior
- Paired with a French's Speckletone Kraft Envelope
- Printed on 100 lb. French's Pop Tone Whip Cream
- Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia

name: Sweet Tea Towel
description:
I don't know about you, but down South we drink our tea sweet and iced. This is a 100% cotton tea towel featuring hand-drawn text and illustrations. Screen printed in orange. It is hemmed on four sides with a loop for hanging and measures 28" x 29".

- Machine washable, cool water, gentle cycle
- Tumble dry low
- Lovingly screen printed in Norfolk, Virginia

name: Norfolk, Virginia Pillow Cover
description:
This is a 12" x 16" pillow cover with our "Norfolk, Virginia" design. Norfolk is home to the largest naval complex in the world. So it was fitting to celebrate this city that we call home with a nautical themed, pen and ink illustration. Screen printed with water-based dark blue ink on off-white linen. This pillow cover features an envelope back for ease of use. Individually printed, cut and sewn by hand. Insert not included.

- Machine Wash Cool 
- Hang Dry 
- Iron Inside Out
- Lovingly made in Norfolk, Virginia

name: Hello Darling Card
description: Simply sweet with a touch of Southern charm. This design started out as a postcard and has been reprinted as a card. This one-color, screen printed card features hand-drawn text. Printed in a summery yellow. - A2 size (4 1/4" x 5 1/2" when folded) - Blank interior - Paired with a French's Speckletone Kraft Envelope - Printed on 100 lb. French's Pop Tone Whip Cream - Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia Available as a single card or as a set of 6

name: Norfolk, Virginia Print
description:
Norfolk, Virginia is home to the largest naval complex in the world. So it was fitting to celebrate this city that we call home with a nautical themed, pen and ink illustration. This one color screen print features dark blue ink on super fancy Rives BFK paper. 

- 10" x 13"
- Printed on Rives BFK
- Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia
- Ships in a large flat kraft mailer

name: Franklin D Roosevelt Print
description: Franklin D Roosevelt was a man of many great quotes and this one touched us personally. This one color screen print features hand-drawn text. Printed in white on dark blue cover stock. - 11" x 17" - Printed on 80 lb. French's Construction Nightshift Blue - Lovingly handcrafted in Norfolk, Virginia - Ships in a flat kraft mailer Check out a time-lapse video of the chalkboard canvas that inspired the print here.

name: Arrow + Heart Stamp
description:
A set of laser engraved, wood mounted rubber stamps. Features hand-drawn illustrations from the "Love Notes" collection. The arrow stamp size is 1 1/2″ x 1/2″. The heart stamp size is 1" x 1/2".

Rubber stamps can take up to a week to ship depending on current inventory. If you’d like a shipping estimate before ordering feel free to ask.
